metadata.description: The name of the Function App that will start extracting information from the target VECO and import it into Sentinel
Storage Account to be able to store state information for certain scripts.
Option to select an existing Storage Account or create a new one.
The name of the Log Analytics Workspace which will be able to store and visualize data.
Option to select an existing Log Analytics workspace or create a new one.
Option to select an existing DCE or create a new one.
Option to select a method for collecting Firewall logs. API method only collects IPS/IDS alerts. If both is selected, data duplication may occur.
Option to select an existing App Service Plan or create a new one.
Data Collection Rule for ingesting VMware Edge Cloud Orchestrator Events.
Data Collection Rule for collecting Enhanced Firewall Service logs using Syslog.
Data Collection Rule for CWS Data Loss Prevention ingestion.
Data Collection Rule for CWS Web Log ingestion.
Data Collection Rule for CWS Health telemetry ingestion.
Data Collection Rule for Enhanced Firewall Service alerts using Search API.
Data Collection Rule for Search API performance logs.
The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the Orchestator (VMware Edge Cloud Orchestrator), for example: vco58-usvi1.velocloud.net.

For the API connection to work, please generate an API token on your VECO Enterprise (including the keyword Token). The account needs Read-Only access only. Additional details can be found in the documentation.
The value defines the frequency of how often the Function App is execxuted in minutes. I.e. a value of 10 means that the functions are executed every ten minutes.

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(timestamp)
| project-away ['@timestamp']
| project-away ['@version']
